original_text: The people of Judah came together to seek help from the Lord; indeed, they came from every town in Judah to seek him.
korean_text: 유다 사람이 여호와께 도우심을 구하려 하여 유다 모든 성읍에서 모여와서 여호와께 간구하더라

sentences.original_text: The people of Judah came together
to seek help from the Lord
indeed, they came from every town in Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 실로, 그들은 유다의 모든 고을에서 왔습니다
